text: 'ina nahn nuhyi al'amwat jmyeana bbethhm yawm alqyamt, wanaktub ma eamiluu min alkhayr walshr, watharahum alty kanuu sbbana fiha fi hayatihim wabaed mmathm min khyr, kalwld alsalh, walealam alnafe, walsdqt aljaryt, wamin shr, kalshrk walesyan, wkll shay' 'ahsaynah fi kitab wadih hu amm alktb, wa'iilayh mrjeha, wahu allwh almhfwz. faealaa aleaql muhasabatan nfsh; liakun qudwatan fi alkhayr fi hayatah wabaed mmath
